description:

The Peregrine Collection is a contemporary classic with timeless sophistication.

title: Orianne Vanity Mirror
description:
The Orianne vanity mirror is exclusively designed and filled with romantic spirit. A piece crafted and inspired by the luxurious designs of the past, this gorgeous beveled mirror features raised floral molding accents and vintage mirror trim inlay with an antique gold finish. Add glamorous vintage charm to your living space with this uniquely designed mirror that will make a statement in any bedroom.
